title: List of municipalities in Yukon
summary: Yukon is the least populous of Canada's three territories with 35,874 residents as of 2016.[1] It is the smallest territory in land area at 474,713 km2 (183,288 sq mi).[2] Yukon's eight municipalities cover only 0.2% of the territory's land mass[lower-alpha 1] but are home to 80.9% of its population.[1][2][4] The remainder of the territory's land area is unorganized.
